title: Sonoma
name: Ravenswood
content: Ravenswood is one of the largest and widest distributed wineries in Sonoma Valley â€” but one the most delightful and least obnoxious "big name" tasting rooms. You can find their wines in your local grocery store or in a cafe in Budapest. Big Zinfandel is the winner here, and you can try their exclusive collections of small-lot wines. Try the Barricia Zinfandel; it's tasty and goes down easy on a chilly Sonoma evening. Be sure to pick up their Zin flavored Sriracha sauce, it's made onsite and exclusive to the winery.
